issue.title: [Python] Remove deprecated placeholders for UseAsync
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15283](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15283). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the 7.0.0 release we are marking the UseAsync parameters / functions as deprecated.  In a future release we should remove these entirely.
